description: This source file defines a React functional component called EmptyState, which renders a minimal, accessible UI element indicating an empty state with optional call-to-action (CTA). It includes styling, accessibility attributes, and uses React Router's Link component for navigation.

methods.name: EmptyState({ title, description, actionLabel, to = '/', actionAriaLabel })
methods.description: Functional React component that renders an accessible empty state section with optional title, description, and CTA button.

ctags.name: EmptyState
ctags.pattern: /^export default function EmptyState({ title, description, actionLabel, to = '\/', actionAriaLabel/
